*   **[Brazil](https://www.gcu.ac.uk/internationalstudy/americas/brazil)**

### What to expect

Hear from some of our international students about their experience moving to Glasgow to study with us.

* * *

## Explore

Why study here?

Discover some of the reasons that GCU is the top choice for students from more than 130 countries.

[Learn more arrow\_forward](https://www.gcu.ac.uk/internationalstudy/whystudyhere)

Open Days

Visit us to explore our campus, courses, and facilities, and to experience life at GCU firsthand during our university open days. Connect with peers, take a campus and accommodation tour, and gain insights from our staff and students about studying with us.

[Learn more arrow\_forward](https://www.gcu.ac.uk/study/opendays)

Scholarships and funding

Discover a range of financial help available to students, including funded scholarships, bursaries, tuition fee reductions and loyalty rewards.

[Learn more arrow\_forward](https://www.gcu.ac.uk/study/scholarships)

VISA Information

The Visa Immigration Support and Advice (VISA) Team at GCU are trained to give you advice and assistance on the application process and can check any supporting documents for you before your submission.

[Learn more arrow\_forward](https://www.gcu.ac.uk/internationalstudy/summerschool/visainformation)

gculondon
via instagram 
2 months ago 
Congratulations to Oyewole Shada who graduated with a Master of Public Health. Oyewole shares his GCU London experience below as part of our #ClassOf2024 spotlights: “I chose to study at GCU London because of its excellent reputation and it was highly recommended to me by friends who have also studied here. “The highlight of my time here at GCU London was the sense of community and togetherness within the campus. The staff really cared about our wellbeing which really impacted my time here. My favourite memory was when the GCU London campus was offering free breakfast to all their students and l had many great times engaging with others over breakfast and making new friends.” Huge congratulations, Oyewole, your hard work has paid off! We are proud of all of our graduates. We wish you all the very best for the future and please do keep in touch! #GCUGrad24 #ClassOf2024 #WeAreGCU 
gculondon
via instagram 
2 months ago 
Congratulations to Kalpani Jayarathne who graduated with a MSc Environmental Management. Kalpani shares her GCU London experience below as part of our #ClassOf2024 spotlights: “I chose to study at GCU London to enhance my knowledge of the environment so I could return to my country with new skills and expertise to make a difference. “I found the academic and non-academic staff to be very supportive and highly skilled, which enhanced my learning experience. A favourite memory of my time at GCU London was the industry visits and off-campus site visits, which significantly enriched my knowledge of environmental management. “I highly recommend this University as a place to study; it offers a supportive environment and is a great place to learn.” Huge congratulations, Kalpani, your hard work has paid off! We are proud of all of our graduates. We wish you all the very best for the future and please do keep in touch! #GCUGrad24 #ClassOf2024 #WeAreGCU 
gculondon
via instagram 
2 months ago 
Congratulations to Rehan Arshad who graduated with a MSc International Banking and Finance. Rehan shares his GCU London experience below as part of our #ClassOf2024 spotlights: “My experience at GCU London has been amazing. The teaching staff are exceptional which creates a supportive learning environment. “Highlights for me would be the vibrant social events that enhance our campus experience. I also had the opportunity to visit the Glasgow campus which has left a lasting impression on me. “I would highly recommend GCU London as a place to study, it is a wonderful University.” Huge congratulations, Rehan, your hard work has paid off! We are proud of all of our graduates. We wish you all the very best for the future and please do keep in touch! #GCUGrad24 #ClassOf2024 #WeAreGCU

Students at Glasgow Caledonian enjoy some of the best access to health services in the UK according to a UK Meds survey. Read more on our website ⬇️
